New York City has the highest cost of living in America, and phone bills are no exception. Vouch Mobile helps New Yorkers across all five boroughs access AT&T's premium network at a price that respects your budget.

Network

AT&T Coverage in New York City

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing New York City residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the metro area. With 99% population coverage and average speeds of 75 Mbps, you'll stay connected wherever you go in the New York City area.

As part of the 19.0 million population metro, New York City benefits from AT&T's ongoing network investment and 5G expansion.

Benefits

Why New York City Residents Choose Vouch

NYC's average phone bill of $135/month is the highest in America—Vouch cuts that by 78%.

Whether you're riding the subway, commuting on Metro-North, or working in Midtown, you need coverage that works underground and above.

No credit check means NYU students, new NYC transplants, and service industry workers can sign up instantly.

AT&T has invested heavily in NYC subway coverage, with 5G now available on lines including the G train.

FAQ

New York City Coverage Questions

Everything you need to know about Vouch Mobile in New York City

Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% coverage across all five NYC boroughs using AT&T's network. From Manhattan to Staten Island, the Bronx to Brooklyn, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the city.

New York City residents pay an average of $135/month for phone service—the highest in America. With Vouch at $30/month, you could save over $1,260 per year. That's your monthly MetroCard or a weekend getaway to the Catskills.

Yes! AT&T has invested heavily in NYC subway coverage. Most underground stations now have cellular service, with 5G available on select lines including the G train. Coverage continues to expand.

Yes! Manhattan has extensive AT&T 5G coverage, with enhanced 5G+ in high-traffic areas like Times Square, Hudson Yards, and the Financial District. All five boroughs have growing 5G coverage.

Absolutely. Delivery workers, rideshare drivers, and freelancers throughout NYC need unlimited data at an affordable price. Vouch's no-contract flexibility is perfect for variable income.

No credit check required. Whether you're a new NYC arrival, a college student, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly with no credit inquiry.
